group_1.textRight: Oh, it was just another Familiar.

group_1.textLeft: [flashEffect:flashWhite2]＄＋＠！！

group_1.textRight: Don't panic, don't panic.
After all... you're not going@anywhere from there anyway.[se:3205_charm][flashEffect:flashWhiteSlow1]

group_1.textLeft: [name:sprite_0:effect_shake]％＆・＃＃!?

group_1.textRight: See, see? You can't go anywhere, you can't@even move the littlest bit, can you?
[surround:1044A08][name:sprite_0:effect_7000_attack01]Well then, I'm gonna take you down.

group_1.textLeft: [bgEffect:shakeLarge][surround:1044A09][name:sprite_0:effect_7002_damage01]％・～＃＊!?

group_1.textCenter: But I haven't defeated the Witch yet,@so I gotta keep going!

group_1.narration: I became a Magical Girl.
...Well, when he said to me:@"Please make a contract with me and@become a Magical Girl",@I had no idea what he was talking about...
But as soon as he told me that I'd get a wish,@I accepted without hesitation.
I was pretty suspicious,@to the point that I wondered if it might@be some sort of prank show...
But when I fought a Familiar right after@contracting, I had no choice but to accept@that everything Kyubey had said was the truth.
And if that was the case...@That was when I realized.
My wish must have also come true.
When I returned home,@I saw my mom crying inconsolably.

group_1.textLeft: Mikoto...Your father...

group_1.textRight: What happened to him?!

group_1.textLeft: He left... He said he was going to live with@another woman...
When he returned today, it was just to take@his luggage with him.

group_1.textRight: ...It came true...
My wish, came true...

group_1.textLeft: Huh...?

group_1.narration: I wished for my father to get out of here.
Kyubey really did make it come true.@He made the man I was so sure I had to kill@vanish just like that.
Yes...@Now me and Mom won't have@to suffer anymore.@Now we'll have enough money for@me to go have fun after school.
My life is gonna change!
And thanks to that, I'm going to be reborn too.@I'll be able to look at my friends in the eye@and tell them how I really feel.
I'm going to study harder than I am now,@and I'm going to get a good job in the future.
Then I'll be sure to pay back everything@my Mom did for me!
Everything I'd dreamt of@had just fallen into my lap.
It's all because I became a Magical Girl.@I can't thank Kyubey enough.
Right now, I'm just overflowing with gratitude!
I burst into laughter, basking in my happiness.
I had no doubts that this bliss would@continue forever.
I was so naive.

group_1.textCenter: The only thing here is a letter, again...
"I went out to have fun.@Here's money for dinner."

group_1.narration: Mom began to leave the house to enjoy@herself a lot more, as if she was somehow@making up for things.
She took the household money for herself, and@I received even less than when he was there.@I couldn't even afford a decent meal.
Even though getting rid of that man@was supposed to solve everything...
My mom ended up becoming just like him,@and my dreams crumbled in a flash.
Is this my punishment?@How ironic...

group_1.textCenter: Well, it doesn't really matter anymore...

group_1.textRight: Hmm...?
You're little Mikoto, aren't you?

group_1.textLeft: Huh...?

group_1.textRight: Remember me? I'm from the same apartment@complex...[chara:800800:lipSynch_0][wait:1][chara:800800:lipSynch_1][chara:800800:cheek_0][chara:800800:face_mtn_ex_050.exp3.json] It's late, were you out playing until now?
You gotta shape up! You won't become a@respectable person if you just have fun all day!
My husband is the living proof of it! Wahahaha!
Did you fight with your mom? Maybe you'd like to@come over to my house since I made a lot of food.

group_1.textLeft: ...Hehe, you really are kind.
I'm sure your family life must be wonderful...

group_1.textRight: It's nothing that impressive, really. We're just a@normal family, the kind you can find anywhere.

group_1.textLeft: ...I'm jealous.

group_1.textRight: Really? Then maybe you should become my child.@I've been so lonely since my daughter left.

group_1.textLeft: Well, let's do that, shall we?

group_1.textRight: [chara:800800:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]―Huh?!

group_1.textLeft: Hehe, surprised? But I have something@even more surprising in store for you.
I have an incredible magic that makes people@do whatever I tell them to.
I always thought it'd be wrong to use it on people,@but...at this point it's alright, isn't it?

group_1.textRight: W-what are you...?[chara:800800:mouthOpen_0]

group_1.textLeft: Let me into your life...Make me your daughter.[se:3205_charm][flashEffect:flashWhiteSlow1]

group_1.textRight: [chara:800800:effect_shake].........
Uh...? What was I...?[chara:800800:mouthOpen_0]

group_1.textLeft: Mom, are you okay? C'mon, let's go home.

group_1.textRight: R-right...Mommy just spaced out for a bit.
Let's hurry home, little Mikoto...@[chara:800800:lipSynch_0][wait:1.2][chara:800800:lipSynch_1][chara:800800:cheek_0][chara:800800:face_mtn_ex_050.exp3.json]Um? Little Mikoto...?

group_1.textLeft: ...Mom, you normally just call me Mikoto, right?

group_1.textRight: That's true...Must be why it felt a little weird...

group_1.textLeft: Hehe, shall we go?

group_1.narration: Being a Magical Girl has its upsides.@Namely, being able to use magic.
In my case, I got the ability@to make people listen to me.
If I tell somebody I want them to@do something, they will always do it.@They'll act just how I want them to.
And so, by using my magic like this,@becoming the daughter of a stranger's family@was no problem at all.

group_1.textRight: There you go, Mikoto, eat plenty!

group_1.textLeft: I'm jealous...@It's all Mikoto's favorites!
Hehe~

group_1.narration: A fun and lively family...@It was so easy to get a hold of what I always wanted.

group_1.textLeft: Ah, um, but...@It's all greasy stuff, I don't really...

group_1.textRight: But you've always been a big fan of meat and@fried food, haven't you?
So I made you plenty!

group_1.textLeft: I bet it's all that exercise that makes you@love food like this.
Oh, that's right, how'd that tournament go?@Did you do well?

group_1.narration: What are these two talking about?
I'm their daughter, but they're always seeing@somebody else instead...

group_1.textRight: Enjoy your food, Mikoto!

group_1.textLeft: Good for you, Mikoto.

group_1.narration: Magic couldn't really give me what I wanted.
So...

group_1.textCenter: There's another Familiar here...@That's the fifth, I gotta get rid of it quick...

group_1.narration: I threw myself completely into fighting as a Magical Girl,@as though possessed.
It was the only thing I had left.
I felt that if I couldn't even perform@my role as a Magical Girl,@it'd be the same as truly disappearing.

group_1.textRight: [flashEffect:flashRed1][bgEffect:shakeSmall][chara:301800:effect_shake][se:3001_chara_damage]Ack!

group_1.narration: It was the first time I had seen@a Magical Girl besides myself.

group_1.textCenter: So there are others...@Well, that's not too surprising, actually.

group_1.narration: I'd be lying if I said that I didn't feel a twinge@of disappointment, but I was also filled with enough@hope to wipe away that silly feeling in an instant.
I decided to bet on that girl.
She's a Magical Girl just like me.@She might understand my feelings,@she might need me.
She could become the reason I belong here...

group_1.textRight: ...that's it!

group_1.narration: I used my magic@and took a single step forward.
For some reason,@my heart was beating like crazy.

group_1.textCenter: This was the beginning of our story.
